downloadDescription: This IP can be used for assessment for migrating Oracle to Azure Database for PostgreSQL and it can be used even for migration after the assessment process.
detailsSection: This IP can be used for assessment for migrating Oracle to Azure Database for PostgreSQL and it can be used even for migration after the assessment process.
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a zipped folder that contains PostgreSQL Migration and Assessment Tools and associated documentation.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do the following:
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
